subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Juan Martin Del Potro is bound for a semifinal matchup with either Rafael Nadal or Fernando González, whose quarterfinal was postponed in the second-set tie breaker Thursday because of rain.
snippet: Juan Martin Del Potro is bound for a semifinal matchup with either Rafael Nadal or Fernando González, whose quarterfinal was postponed in the second-set tie breaker Thursday because of rain.
